', ' As we need to combine an understanding of big data analytics with its specific constraints and a comprehensive functional understanding of the bank’s business in Credit Risk, the team is made of profiles as being a mix of Big Data Analyst (on the technical side) and Business Analyst (on the functional side).All of the team members have a data-centric technical background embarking on a steep learning curve of the functional, business knowledge side.If you are not afraid of deep diving into the data to investigate an issue at the finest level, solve a problem or extract an information, then this challenge is suited for you!', ' Young professionals (2-5 years experiences) ', ' Strong academic background, with a Master degree ', ' Relevant experience in Data related roles including analysis, engineering, visualization ', ' Significant experience in data exploration and data preparation ', ' Proven record in SQL ', ' Experience with Python programming language is a must. Position: Data scientist / Risk Data Analyst Trainee
AllQualifications: [' Develops the infrastructure (i.e. systems, models and services) to quantify, analyze and report risks,', ' Manages the quality of RISK data to ensure high standards of risk representation, analysis and reporting,', ' Independently assesses the Bank’s liquidity, interest rate and foreign exchange risk of ALMT activities.', ' Stress Testing Data Analytics', ' Stress Testing Methodologies and Models', ' Excellent written and verbal communication skills', ' Written and oral fluency in English', ' Strong academic background, with a Master degree', ' Programming skills required (SQL, Python, R…)', ' Recently graduated or in last academic year at school or following a Post-Graduate', ' Ability to query and to analyze data', ' Strong interest in the financial data', ' Fluent in English']
Industries: Information Technology and Services, Banking, and Financial Services

AllQualifications: ['As part of your modelling projects, you assess the needs expressed, define and propose the adapted deliverables and estimate their burden and time-frame through an implementation plan that takes into account the challenges and constraints; You use statistical modelling methods, analyse and explain the results;', 'You lead the project, keep track of the schedule and support the implementation and monitoring of the tools issued;', 'As part of the monitoring and optimization of the BNP Paribas Personal Finance score models, you participate in the monitoring campaigns of the scores: generation and analysis of monitoring results, diagnosis and action plan;', "You are also responsible for conducting or analysing statistical studies related to risk prediction models. If necessary, you take part in analytical support missions to the Group's international entities and in the processing of audit recommendations relating to the Basel regulatory project;", "In addition, you actively contribute to the transversal missions of the Scoring Centre: technological and methodological watch, regulatory watch, training, analytical support for the Group's international entities.", 'You have a degree in Mathematics or Statistics.', 'Have you a strong scientific background and at least 4 years of successful experience in a statistical / risk environment (preferably in a banking environment)?', 'Are you proficient in SAS or data lab and you have a strong knowledge of the main data science libraries and have already experienced machine models industrialization?', 'Are you able to work on several projects in parallel and are acknowledged for your accuracy?', 'Do you speak English? ']
Industries: Staffing and Recruiting, Banking, and Financial Services

AllQualifications: [' Licenciatura em Engenharia informática ou similar;', ' Experiência profissional mínima de 1 ano na área;', ' Autonomia e sentido de responsabilidade;', ' Espírito por trabalho em equipa e capacidade de iniciativa;', ' Capacidade de comunicação;', ' Bons conhecimentos de Inglês.', ' Na nossa empresa, terás bastante acompanhamento semanal e mensal;', ' O teu manager vai estar atento às tuas motivações e sugestões;', ' Tens acesso à Plataforma online que podes tirar as formações que pretenderes;', ' As vitórias e conquistas serão festejadas em conjunto;', ' Acompanhamento da nossa equipa de Recursos Humanos e Suporte;', ' Feedback constante do teu trabalho;', ' E como é óbvio bastantes Eventos']
Industries: Information Technology and Services, Computer Software, and Human Resources

AllQualifications: [' Licenciatura em Engenharia Informática ou similar', ' Experiência profissional como Data Scientist', ' Experiência com R, Python, Java ou Scala', ' Experiência com base de dados não relacionais', ' Boa capacidade de comunicação', ' Flexibilidade e dinamismo', ' Inglês', ' Tornamos reais os projetos em que participamos', ' Amamos o que fazemos, e temos orgulho no resultado do nosso trabalho', ' Somos simples e eficientes', ' Valorizamos as nossas pessoas', ' Somos uma equipa dinâmica, íntegra e de confiança']
Industries: Information Technology and Services, Computer Software, and Human Resources

AllQualifications: ['Lead the development of study protocols, statistical analysis plans (SAPs), programming specification and output documents', 'Guide the analytical team to clean and prepare small to large-sized real-world healthcare databases', 'Serve as methodological expert to provide guidance on design and analysis of observational studies', 'Lead the quality control of SAPs, analyses and reporting of statistical analysis', 'Contribute to communication strategies and present insights and perspectives to clients, internal training courses and conference presentations', 'Oversee the preparation of abstracts, manuscripts and/or presentations to conferences', 'Contribute to business development activities including proposal development', 'Lead operational efficiencies of workflows, including writing of internal guidance documents (e.g., SOPs and quality management documents)', 'MSc, PhD or equivalent in statistics, biostatistics, epidemiology or in a related discipline', 'Proven experience working with large, individual-level data sets/ databases', 'Strong statistical programming skills in a statistical package (SAS and/or R)', 'Excellent time management skills, contributing to multiple projects with competing timelines', 'Commitment to working collaboratively and effectively with people of other disciplines', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills', 'Fluency in English (spoken and written)', 'Exposure to the healthcare and pharmaceutical industries', 'Previous line management experience', 'Prior experience working in a consultancy, CRO or other service sector in the healthcare industry', 'Knowledge of real-world data needs of pharmaceutical clients', 'Interpersonal, teamwork and communication skills']
Industries: Pharmaceuticals

AllQualifications: [' Obtain data from multiple sources, collate, analyse, and triangulate information to develop reliable fact bases', ' Apply a range of descriptive and/or predictive analytical techniques to rigorously identify client issues and synthesize analysis into clear, sound recommendations;', ' Extract intellectual capital from engagement work and actively share tools, methods and best practices across projects', ' Support MasterCard Advisors and local market account teams in client relationship management and business development effort, where required', ' Passion: Actively seeks responsibility and takes pride in delivering the highest quality results and recommendations to our clients.', ' Analytic Excellence: Demonstrates a strong aptitude for analytical skills around data science disciplines.', ' Project Management: Clear interest in project delivery with business clients, and intuition for the way that companies make decisions.', ' Communication and Presence: Excellent written and verbal communication skills in client-facing situations, positioning Mastercard’s solutions as high value solutions in sales and delivery conversations.', ' Teamwork: Willingness to work within small teams to produce outstanding deliverables, with a will to win attitude.', " Integrity: Commitment to Mastercard's values of honesty and integrity with a willingness to embrace and learn from our mistakes.", ' Diverse Perspective: Brings a unique skillset or approach to the table in every client engagement or internal activity.', ' Excellent analytical skills across descriptive and/or predictive analytics', ' Experience of machine learning and AI would be an advantage', ' Undergraduate or master’s degree and work experience after completing your degree(s)', ' Solid ability to write SQL', ' Comfortable programming in R and/or Python. Knowledge of Hadoop & Pyspark also preferable.', ' Experience with big data and a solid foundation in managing large datasets', ' Experience working with payments/card data a big plus', ' Ability to communicate complex ideas effectively – both verbally and in writing', ' Proven team player with proven ability to work with all levels in a highly intellectual, collaborative, and fast paced environment', ' Professional level English language capability/ and local language', ' Candidates must be eligible to work in the country of which they are applying for a position in, as well as eligible to apply for travel visas as required by travel needs']
Industries: Financial Services, Information Technology and Services, and Internet

Knowledge of Hadoop & Pyspark also preferable.', ' Experience with big data and a solid foundation in managing large datasets', ' Experience with managing project or leading small team', ' Experience working with payments/card data a big plus', ' Ability to communicate complex ideas effectively – both verbally and in writing', ' Proven team player with proven ability to work with all levels in a highly intellectual, collaborative, and fast paced environment', ' Professional level English language capability/ and local language', ' Candidates must be eligible to work in the country of which they are applying for a position in, as well as eligible to apply for travel visas as required by travel needs']

AllQualifications: ['Lead the development of study protocols, statistical analysis plans (SAPs), programming specification and output documents', 'Guide the analytical team to clean and prepare small to large-sized real-world healthcare databases', 'Serve as methodological expert to provide guidance on design and analysis of observational studies', 'Lead the quality control of SAPs, analyses and reporting of statistical analysis', 'Contribute to communication strategies and present insights and perspectives to clients, internal training courses and conference presentations', 'Oversee the preparation of abstracts, manuscripts and/or presentations to conferences', 'Contribute to business development activities including proposal development', 'Lead operational efficiencies of workflows, including writing of internal guidance documents (e.g., SOPs and quality management documents)', 'MSc, PhD or equivalent in statistics, biostatistics, epidemiology or in a related discipline', 'Proven experience working with large, individual-level data sets/ databases', 'Strong statistical programming skills in a statistical package (SAS and/or R)', 'Excellent time management skills, contributing to multiple projects with competing timelines', 'Commitment to working collaboratively and effectively with people of other disciplines', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills', 'Fluency in English (spoken and written)', 'Exposure to the healthcare and pharmaceutical industries', 'Previous line management experience', 'Prior experience working in a consultancy, CRO or other service sector in the healthcare industry', 'Knowledge of real-world data needs of pharmaceutical clients', 'Interpersonal, teamwork and communication skills']

AllQualifications: ['8951406Data09-10-2020EmpregadorINOV ? Instituto de Engenharia de Sistemas e Computadores InovaçãoPaís Da EmpregoPortugalDistritoLisboaLocalidadeSaldanhaCategoria(s)Informática e TecnologiasIntervalo SalarialInformação exclusiva JobMatchDescrição do anúncio : ORGANIZAÇÃOSomos uma das maiores infraestruturas tecnológicas nacionais no domínio das Tecnologias da Informação, Comunicações e Eletrónica (TICE), um instituto dinamizador das relações entre as Instituições de Ensino Superior e a sociedade e economia, com vista ao aumento da sua competitividade. Formamos uma equipa multidisciplinar, onde a nossa visão passa por Liderar a inovação e a nossa missão por Transformar o conhecimento em tecnologia, mantendo sempre os nossos valores: confiança, agilidade, excelência e cooperação.Desejamos um Data Scientist para integrar e expandir a nossa equipa.O QUE ESPERAMOS DOS NOSSOS CANDIDATOSA reportar ao Coordenador de Unidade de Inteligência Artificial, terá como principais responsabilidades:»Desenvolvimento de aplicações com elevado nível de qualidade, serviço e disponibilidade;»Pesquisa, desenvolvimento, teste e avaliação de novas ideias e soluções;»Utilização e aplicação de técnicas avançadas de Machine Learning e NLP (processamento de linguagem natural) em projetos;»Participação ativa em todas as fases do ciclo de vida de desenvolvimento de software: análise, planeamento, desenvolvimento, teste, operacionalidade e suporte técnico;»Ser parte essencial do processo de geração de ideias e participar em discussões de identificação e criação de soluções inteligentes;»Orientar, coordenar e apoiar os membros da equipa;»Cumprir com as metas dos projetos e gerir as expectativas dos stakeholders;PERFIL»Formação superior ao nível de Mestrado/Doutoramento em áreas de Inteligência Artificial/similares;»Experiência mínima de 3 anos em funções relacionadas com Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing ou Data Science (preferencialmente em funções de liderança);»Proficiência em Python e em plataformas de Machine Learning (NumPy, SciPy, Scikit-Learn, Keras, TensorFlow, PyTorch, etc.);»Forte sentido de responsabilidade, autonomia, proatividade e resolução de problemas;»Gosto pelo trabalho em equipa, vontade em aprender e curiosidade intelectual.O QUE OS NOSSOS CANDIDATOS PODEM ESPERAR DE NÓS»Integração em projeto dinâmico e ambicioso;»Ambiente de trabalho orientado para resultados, divertido e dinâmico;»Flexibilidade para teletrabalho/ horário;»Remuneração e condições competitivas e seguro de saúde.Se pensas numa carreira com autonomia, liderança e gestão mantendo o foco na área de Inteligência Artificial envia a tua candidatura com a referência Data_Scientist', AllQualifications: ['Help customers drive significant business outcomes and ROI by leveraging the insights uncovered through process mining capability', 'Collaborate directly with senior level, process owners and technical teams within each customer to understand their goals, objectives and requirements and translate them into process mining capability technical requirements', 'Develop automatic ways to track and monitor value realization, contributing to ROI build-up', 'Present implementation results to senior level and other internal customer teams', 'Plan, schedule, and manage project timelines and activities from project kick-off through training to ensure each project is delivered on time and meets customer requirements ', 'Implement process automation technology to speed up the customer’s processes, to drive value and to improve the process conformance rate', 'Own and drive end-to-end the implementation of our process mining capability across various internal customers', 'Connect the process mining capability with the customer’s on-premise/ Cloud ERP & IT systems ', 'Extract and transform data and load them into the process mining platform', 'Build / update analysis in Process Studio', 'Design process and customer-specific dashboards, analyses and reports', 'Implement the most relevant KPIs measuring the customer’s success', 'create new signals in Action Engine', 'New functionality development (e.g. ML Workbench) ', 'Implement operational App', 'Successfully completed studies in Business Informatics, Computer Science, Information-oriented Business Administration/ Economics, Mathematics.', 'Have gained 3+ years working experience in IT-Consulting, Management Consulting, Process Improvement or a similar area ', 'Strong appetite for value driven approaches (KPIs definition, business case calculations, value realization approaches) and Data topics (Big Data, Data Mining, and Process Mining)', 'Strong capabilities of translating business/functional requirements to technical developments', 'Strong communicating skills, being able to translate complex problems into step-by-step explanations and solutions', 'Have experience and high interest in modern technologies and methods like REST/SOAP API-Management, Data Ingestion & Streaming, SSO, LDAP, IT Security, etc.', 'Have advanced knowledge of SQL, PQL or other programming languages (Python, R, Matlab...)', 'Have experience with data pipelines and ETL processes, ETL jobs, data warehouses/lakes, data modelling, schema design, ideally for larger volumes of data', 'A good understanding of data structures in ERP systems (e.g. SAP, Oracle) is a plus', 'Enjoy deep technical discussions as much as transferring your technical knowledge in generally understandable terms to a broader audience', 'Search for a job with a steep learning curve in order to think outside the box and to continuously broaden your knowledge', 'Love converting problems into solutions', 'Self-starter able to navigate complex scenarios who truly enjoys working in a fast-paced, innovative, enterprise technology environment', 'A general understanding of companies business processes and related financial metrics and are willing to learn in this area. Knowledge of standard ERPs (SAP and related business processes (Order to cash, procure to pay…) is a strong plus.', 'Fluent and comfortable in working and presenting in English, other languages are an advantage', 'Celonis Track Certification (Analyst, Data Engineer) is a plus']

Formamos uma equipa multidisciplinar, onde a nossa visão passa por Liderar a inovação em TICE e a nossa missão por Transformar o conhecimento em tecnologia com valor na cadeia de inovação, mantendo sempre os nossos valores: confiança, agilidade, excelência e cooperação.Desejamos atualmente um Data Scientist & Tech Leader para integrar e expandir a nossa equipa num projeto tecnologicamente ambicioso.O QUE ESPERAMOS DOS NOSSOS CANDIDATOSA reportar ao Coordenador de Unidade de Inteligência Artificial, terá como principais responsabilidades:»Desenvolvimento de aplicações com elevado nível de qualidade, serviço e disponibilidade;»Pesquisa, desenvolvimento, teste e avaliação de novas ideias e soluções;»Utilização e aplicação de técnicas avançadas de Machine Learning e NLP (processamento de linguagem natural) em projetos;»Participação ativa em todas as fases do ciclo de vida de desenvolvimento de software: análise, planeamento, desenvolvimento, teste, operacionalidade e suporte técnico;»Ser parte essencial do processo de geração de ideias e participar em discussões de identificação e criação de soluções inteligentes;»Orientar e apoiar os membros da equipa;»Cumprir com as metas dos projetos e gerir as expectativas dos stakeholders;PERFIL»Formação superior ao nível de Mestrado ou Doutoramento em áreas relacionadas com Inteligência Artificial;»Experiência mínima de 3 anos em função relacionada com Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing ou Data Science, de preferência em funções de liderança;»Proficiência em Python e em plataformas de Machine Learning (NumPy, SciPy, Scikit-Learn, Keras, TensorFlow, PyTorch, etc.);»Forte sentido de responsabilidade, autonomia, proatividade e resolução de problemas;»Gosto pelo trabalho em equipa;»Vontade em aprender e curiosidade intelectual.O QUE OS NOSSOS CANDIDATOS PODEM ESPERAR DE NÓS»Integração em projeto dinâmico e ambicioso;»Ambiente de trabalho orientado para resultados, divertido e anos em função relacionada com Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing ou Data Science, de preferência em funções de liderança;»Proficiência em Python e em plataformas de Machine Learning e curiosidade intelectual.O QUE OS NOSSOS CANDIDATOS PODEM ESPERAR DE NÓS»Integração em projeto dinâmico e ambicioso;»Ambiente de trabalho orientado para resultados, divertido e Formamos uma equipa multidisciplinar, onde a nossa visão passa por Liderar a inovação em TICE e a nossa missão por Transformar o conhecimento em tecnologia com valor na cadeia de inovação, mantendo sempre os nossos valores: confiança, agilidade, excelência e cooperação.Desejamos atualmente um Data Scientist & Tech Leader para integrar e expandir a nossa equipa num projeto tecnologicamente ambicioso.O QUE ESPERAMOS DOS NOSSOS CANDIDATOSA reportar ao Coordenador de Unidade de Inteligência Artificial, terá como principais responsabilidades:»Desenvolvimento de aplicações com elevado nível de qualidade, serviço e disponibilidade;»Pesquisa, desenvolvimento, teste e avaliação de novas ideias e soluções;»Utilização e aplicação de técnicas avançadas de Machine Learning e NLP (processamento de linguagem natural) em projetos;»Participação ativa em todas as fases do ciclo de vida de desenvolvimento de software: análise, planeamento, desenvolvimento, teste, operacionalidade e suporte técnico;»Ser parte essencial do processo de geração de ideias e participar em discussões de identificação e criação de soluções inteligentes;»Orientar e apoiar os membros da equipa;»Cumprir com as anos em função relacionada com Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing ou Data Science, de preferência em funções de liderança;»Proficiência em Python e em plataformas de Machine Learning (NumPy, SciPy, Scikit-Learn, Keras, TensorFlow, PyTorch, etc.);»Forte sentido de responsabilidade, autonomia, proatividade e resolução de problemas;»Gosto pelo trabalho em equipa;»Vontade em aprender AllQualifications: [' Execute tasks within the full lifecycle on maintenance and evolution of the Data & Information architecture landscape within the company; ', 'Acquire data from primary or secondary data sources and maintain databases/data systems;', 'Identify, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets. Filter and “clean” data by reviewing reports and performance indicators to locate and correct data source problems;', "Identify opportunities for data improvement- whether there's a data point missing, queries that are running slowly, or metrics that don't look quite right, and share new ideas/suggestions;", 'Support the design, implement and support data warehousing projects, implements business rules via stored procedures, middleware or other technologies and defines user interfaces;', 'Verify the accuracy of data and maintain and support the data warehouse activities;', 'Support, plan and conduct data warehouse unit system tests, monitors and takes corrective action as needed;', 'Support the build and maintain data warehouse databases, designs, codes, tests and implements complex programs, and scripts;', 'Build key data sets to empower operational and exploratory analysis. Monitoring key metrics, understanding root causes of changes in metrics;', 'Identify and analyze potential data sources which will improve the consistency, timeliness and/or completeness of our data sets.', 'At least 5 years of experience with demonstrable exposure and knowledge in the following areas Data Management, Data Integration, Data Warehousing and Data Analytics subject areas;', 'Experience working in Investment Banking / Finance / Insurance / Services Industry / Real Estate Industry Preferred;', 'Strong expertise in assisting in delivering well-organized reports, dashboards, data analysis, and statistical models - Devise key metrics with clients and leverage knowledge of data preparation activities such as extraction, cleansing, aggregation, and data analysis to deliver on internal/client requirements;', 'Superb written and verbal skills, ability to communicate technical and non-technical aspects;', "Bachelor’s degree in Data Science, Management or Mathematic's. Advanced degree preferred.", 'Experienced on development and maintenance of relational databases. Exposure to Microsoft SQL Server / Azure SQL is a plus;', ' Experienced on implementation and maintenance of ETL processes. Exposure to Microsoft SQL Server Integration Services / Azure Data Factory is a plus; ', 'Proficiency working with Microsoft Office, including Excel and Power BI;', ' Knowledge and practical expertise on developing and rolling out solutions using the following languages- C#, JSON, XML, R e Phyton; ', 'Strong expertise with a quantitative aptitude and ability to perform market analysis.']

TecnologiasIntervalo SalarialInformação exclusiva JobMatchDescrição do anúncio : ORGANIZAÇÃOSomos uma das maiores infraestruturas tecnológicas nacionais no domínio das Tecnologias da Informação, Comunicações e Eletrónica (TICE), um instituto dinamizador das relações entre as Instituições de Ensino Superior e a sociedade e economia, com vista ao aumento da sua competitividade. Formamos uma equipa multidisciplinar, onde a nossa visão passa por Liderar a inovação e a nossa missão por Transformar o conhecimento em tecnologia, mantendo sempre os nossos valores: confiança, agilidade, excelência e cooperação.Desejamos atualmente um Data Scientist & Tech Leader para integrar e expandir a nossa equipa.O QUE ESPERAMOS DOS NOSSOS CANDIDATOSA reportar ao Coordenador de Unidade de Inteligência Artificial, terá como principais responsabilidades:»Desenvolvimento de aplicações com elevado nível de qualidade, serviço e disponibilidade;»Pesquisa, desenvolvimento, teste e avaliação de novas ideias e soluções;»Utilização e aplicação de técnicas avançadas de Machine Learning e NLP (processamento de linguagem natural) em projetos;»Participação ativa em todas as fases do ciclo de vida de desenvolvimento de software: análise, planeamento, desenvolvimento, teste, operacionalidade e suporte técnico;»Ser parte essencial do processo de geração de ideias e participar em discussões de identificação e criação de soluções inteligentes;»Orientar e apoiar os membros da equipa;»Cumprir com as metas dos projetos e gerir as expectativas dos stakeholders;PERFIL»Formação superior ao nível de Mestrado/Doutoramento em áreas de Inteligência Artificial/similares;»Experiência mínima de 3 anos em funções relacionadas com Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing ou Data Science (preferencialmente em funções de liderança);»Proficiência em Python e em plataformas de Machine Learning (NumPy, SciPy, Scikit-Learn, Keras, TensorFlow, PyTorch, etc.);»Forte sentido de responsabilidade, autonomia, proatividade e resolução de problemas;»Gosto pelo trabalho em equipa, vontade em aprender e curiosidade intelectual.O QUE OS NOSSOS CANDIDATOS PODEM ESPERAR DE NÓS»Integração em projeto dinâmico e ambicioso;»Ambiente de trabalho orientado para resultados, divertido e dinâmico;»Flexibilidade para teletrabalho/ horário;»Remuneração e condições competitivas e AllQualifications: ['As part of your modelling projects, you assess the needs expressed, define and propose the adapted deliverables and estimate their burden and time-frame through an implementation plan that takes into account the challenges and constraints; You use statistical modelling methods, analyse and explain the results;', 'You lead the project, keep track of the schedule and support the implementation and monitoring of the tools issued;', 'As part of the monitoring and optimization of the BNP Paribas Personal Finance score models, you participate in the monitoring campaigns of the scores: generation and analysis of monitoring results, diagnosis and action plan;', "You are also responsible for conducting or analysing statistical studies related to risk prediction models. If necessary, you take part in analytical support missions to the Group's international entities and in the processing of audit recommendations relating to the Basel regulatory project;", "In addition, you actively contribute to the transversal missions of the Scoring Centre: technological and methodological watch, regulatory watch, training, analytical support for the Group's international entities.", 'You have a degree in Mathematics or Statistics.', 'Have you a strong scientific background and at least 4 years of successful experience in a statistical / risk environment (preferably in a banking environment)?', 'Are you proficient in SAS or data lab and you have a strong knowledge of the main data science libraries and have already experienced machine models industrialization?', 'Are you able to work on several projects in parallel and are acknowledged for your accuracy?', 'Do you speak English? ']
Industries: Staffing and Recruiting, Banking, and Financial Services

AllQualifications: ['Conceptualize and develop deep learning models to model driver behavior, road detection, signal detection, in cabin characteristics, etc.', 'Provide signals based on video/image detection algorithms for other Machine learning algorithms, such as road flow or traffic densities.', 'Develop signal processing models as to characterize the attributes to a time series matrix.', 'Test and put algorithms into a production ready state.', 'Constructing solution concepts from insights using familiar or unfamiliar data sources or complete or partial data.', 'Signal creation from image processing to other machine learning algorithms.', 'Imputing the dependency between sensors and time series data.', 'Design and build machine/deep learning and optimization algorithms efficiently', 'Integrate, simulate, and test impact of algorithms and features on the overall system', 'Develop and execute necessary analyses, simulations, etc. to validate models and identify improvement opportunities', 'Store, retrieve and visualize results in a manner that facilitates required analyses', 'Effectively conceptualize analyses to business/product stakeholders', 'Minimum 2 years of relevant experience in one or more of the following:', 'Ph.D., Master’s or an outstanding Bachelors in Computer Science, Electrical/Computer', 'Engineering, Mathematics/Statistics, Operations Research, Industrial & Systems Engineering, or related technical disciplines.', 'Strong fundamentals in Machine and Deep Learning.', 'Proficient in statistical programming in languages such as Python and R; and strong working knowledge in RDBMS such as PostgreSQL or NoSQL\xa0', 'Strong programming skills in Java and Scala, experience in functional programming is preferred.', 'Self-motivated and independent learner who is willing to share knowledge with the team.', 'Efficient and detail-oriented time manager who thrives in a dynamic and fast-paced working', 'environment', 'Experience in working with vehicle imagery.', 'Familiar with Linux/Unix and shell scripting, experience in cloud computing is a plus.']
Industries: Information Technology and Services and Computer Software

Company: INOV ? Instituto de Engenharia de Sistemas e Computadores Inovação
AllQualifications: ['8951406Data09-10-2020EmpregadorINOV ? Instituto de Engenharia de Sistemas e Computadores InovaçãoPaís Da EmpregoPortugalDistritoLisboaLocalidadeSaldanhaCategoria(s)Informática e TecnologiasIntervalo SalarialInformação exclusiva JobMatchDescrição do anúncio : ORGANIZAÇÃOSomos uma das maiores infraestruturas tecnológicas nacionais no domínio das Tecnologias da Informação, Comunicações e Eletrónica (TICE), um instituto dinamizador das relações entre as Instituições de Ensino Superior e a sociedade e economia, com vista ao aumento da sua competitividade. Formamos uma equipa multidisciplinar, onde a nossa visão passa por Liderar a inovação e a nossa missão por Transformar o conhecimento em tecnologia, mantendo sempre os nossos valores: confiança, agilidade, excelência e cooperação.Desejamos um Data Scientist para integrar e expandir a nossa equipa.O QUE ESPERAMOS DOS NOSSOS CANDIDATOSA reportar ao Coordenador de Unidade de Inteligência Artificial, terá como principais responsabilidades:»Desenvolvimento de aplicações com elevado nível de qualidade, serviço e disponibilidade;»Pesquisa, desenvolvimento, teste e avaliação de novas ideias e soluções;»Utilização e aplicação de técnicas avançadas de Machine Learning e NLP (processamento de linguagem natural) em projetos;»Participação ativa em todas as fases do ciclo de vida de desenvolvimento de software: análise, planeamento, desenvolvimento, teste, operacionalidade e suporte técnico;»Ser parte essencial do processo de geração de ideias e participar em discussões de identificação e criação de soluções inteligentes;»Orientar, coordenar e apoiar os membros da equipa;»Cumprir com as metas dos projetos e gerir as expectativas dos stakeholders;PERFIL»Formação superior ao nível de Mestrado/Doutoramento em áreas de Inteligência Artificial/similares;»Experiência mínima de 3 anos em funções relacionadas com Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing ou Data Science (preferencialmente em funções de liderança);»Proficiência em Python e em plataformas de Machine Learning (NumPy, SciPy, Scikit-Learn, Keras, TensorFlow, PyTorch, etc.);»Forte sentido de responsabilidade, autonomia, proatividade e resolução de problemas;»Gosto pelo trabalho em equipa, vontade em aprender e curiosidade intelectual.O QUE OS NOSSOS CANDIDATOS PODEM ESPERAR DE NÓS»Integração em projeto dinâmico e ambicioso;»Ambiente de trabalho orientado para resultados, divertido e dinâmico;»Flexibilidade para teletrabalho/ horário;»Remuneração e condições competitivas e seguro de saúde.Se pensas numa carreira com autonomia, liderança e gestão mantendo o foco na área de Inteligência Artificial envia a tua candidatura com a referência Data_Scientist', Por isso, temos um plano de carreira diferenciado, suportado por um modelo transparente, capaz de identificar, desenvolver e agregar valor às competências de cada colaborador.', 'Criámos o conceito de Strategic Gatherings, um momento onde são partilhadas informações sobre a performance da empresa e se abordam perspectivas de futuro a curto prazo.', 'Estamos focados num programa de Thought Leadership que pretende promover e desenvolver o talento, a experiência e a paixão pela tecnologia dos nossos colaboradores.\xa0', 'Learning & Innovating', 'Realizamos encontros informais de partilha de conhecimento entre os nossos colaboradores e a comunidade tecnologia, abrindo as portas da “nossa casa” para meetups.', 'Investimos na formação contínua dos nossos colaboradores através da disponibilização de workshops e formações técnicas e comportamentais, aulas de línguas, formações e certificações externas financiadas e estabelecendo parcerias com entidades formadoras.', 'Caring & Sharing', 'Criámos os Blue Angels, um programa de responsabilidade social e ambiental que coloca a solidariedade dos nossos colaboradores ao serviço da comunidade.', 'Adoramos bons momentos de convívios e são muitos os que organizamos, desde encontros temáticos mensais a eventos para a família, nunca dizemos que não a uma boa festa.\xa0']
Industries: Information Technology and Services

Position: Senior Data Scientist / Engineer - Stress Testing and Data Analytics
AllQualifications: ["BNP Paribas is a leader in the Eurozone, and a prominent international banking institution with strong roots in Europe's banking history. It has a presence in 71 countries, with 200 000 Employees – including more than 150 000 in Europe and 6 000 in Portugal alone. ", ' The STDA team in Lisbon is dedicated to credit and works jointly with the onshore STDA team based in Paris, as one team, split in two geographies.The team is looking for a data scientist / engineer, with primary focus on development, maintenance and testing of the STDA process, to build quarterly databases with actuals closing date figures, in a Big Data environment.Appetite for the credit data functional content and understanding of stress tests modelling concepts are a nice-to-have.This Includes The Following ProcessesThe objective is to set up a quarterly database for STFS, used as a starting point to stress capital and cost of risk on the credit risk perimeter of the bank.', ' Data collection, Data ingestion, Data quality, Data preparation, Data cleaning with DATAIKU DSS (Data Science Studio), using PySpark, Hive, Hadoop ', ' Data consolidation in a strong control and analyses framework ', ' Data visualization with Tableau developing dynamic and intelligent dash-boarding ', ' Specific contributions to regulatory and internal stress testing exercises ', '  As we need to combine an understanding of big data analytics with its specific constraints and a comprehensive functional understanding of the bank’s business in Credit Risk, the team is made of profiles as being a mix of Big Data Analyst (on the technical side) and Business Analyst (on the functional side).All of the team members have a data-centric technical background embarking on a steep learning curve of the functional, business knowledge side.If you are not afraid of deep diving into the data to investigate an issue at the finest level, solve a problem or extract an information, then this challenge is suited for you!  ', ' As we need to combine an understanding of big data analytics with its specific constraints and a comprehensive functional understanding of the bank’s business in Credit Risk, the team is made of profiles as being a mix of Big Data Analyst (on the technical side) and Business Analyst (on the functional side).All of the team members have a data-centric technical background embarking on a steep learning curve of the functional, business knowledge side.If you are not afraid of deep diving into the data to investigate an issue at the finest level, solve a problem or extract an information, then this challenge is suited for you!', ' Young professionals (2-5 years experiences) ', ' Strong academic background, with a Master degree ', ' Relevant experience in Data related roles including analysis, engineering, visualization ', ' Significant experience in data exploration and data preparation ', ' Proven record in SQL ', ' Experience with Python programming language is a must. ', ' Knowledge of Risk Management principles is a plus. ', ' Languages: fluent in English, French is a plus ', ' Strong interest in data management and functional content of the data ', ' Ability to work with tight deadlines and multidisciplinary teams ', ' Be a team player ', ' Open and client-oriented mind-set ', ' Autonomy & Adaptability ', ' Strong curiosity ', ' Result oriented ', ' Ability to communicate and share ', ' This role will expose the candidate to a wide range of Risk and Finance professionals within the bank. Therefore, communication skills, both written and verbal, play an essential part in the day-to-day role. ', ' Very strong ethics standards ']
Industries: Information Technology and Services, Banking, and Financial Services

AllQualifications: ['Bachelor’s degree in the IT area or equivalent;', 'At least +1 year of experience as a Data scientist;', 'Working experience with Data Science toolkits (e.g. R, Python, Java or Scala);', 'Good Knowledge of Hadoop or Spark; ', 'Hands-on experience\xa0with databases;', 'Knowledge of Big Data;', 'Working experience with Agile methodology;', 'Fluency in English (written and spoken).', 'Fair & Courageous', 'We promote Ask Me Anything sessions, a moment where any employee can question, suggest or share any topic live with the CEO.', 'We have a referral program that financially recognizes our employees for helping the company grow.', 'Ambition & Results', 'We believe in supporting the personal and professional growth of our employees. That’s why we have a differentiated career path management supported by a transparent model, capable of identifying, developing and adding value to your skills.', "We’ve created a Strategic Gatherings concept, a moment where information about the company's performance is shared and where we discuss short-term prospects for the future.", "We are focused on a Thought Leadership program that aims to promote and develop our employees' talent, experience and passion for technology.", 'Learning & Innovating', 'We hold informal meetings to promote knowledge sharing moments between our employees and the technological community.', 'We invest in the continuous training of our employees through technical and behavioral workshops, language classes, external funded training and certifications and by establishing partnerships with training providers.', 'Caring & Sharing', 'We created the Blue Angels, a social and environmental responsibility program that puts the solidarity of our employees at the service of the community.', 'We love some good socializing moments and we hold as many as we can, from monthly themed meetings to family events, we never say no to a good party.']
Industries: Information Technology and Services

AllQualifications: ['Identify bottlenecks and recommend optimizations for service owners to improve capacity utilization of applications', 'Identify and institute new planning verticals', 'Develop simulation models and tools which analyze multi level constraints (data center space and power, budget, lead time constraints)', 'Collaborate with application owners and product managers to understand capacity requirements, software optimization initiatives, and generate short/long term capacity demand forecasts', 'Data Modeling/Business Intelligence', 'Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing capacity planning infrastructure for greater scalability', 'Design, develop and scale user friendly systems, reports and dashboards which support capacity planning', 'Create monitoring and reporting tools for capacity related analysis', 'Build ROI models which help leadership teams prioritize and manage risk across new product initiatives, reliability/efficiency projects and existing applications/features', 'Strong expertise in Microsoft Excel', 'PL/SQL server development experience', 'Experience with object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python, Java, C++, Scala', 'Degree in Operations Research, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Computer Science, Engineering, MIS or closely related field', '3+ years relevant work experience as a Capacity Planner, Supply Chain Analyst, Business Analyst, BI Engineer or Data Scientist', 'Demonstrated ability and experience to influence, develop productive working relationships, and lead technical teams and key stakeholders from different business functions', 'A diverse technical acumen--actively contribute to technical discussions, proactively identify challenges and risks, working closely with engineers and product manager on addressing challenges, and form mitigation plans', 'Excellent interpersonal, presentation and communication skills. Effective problem-solving skills', 'Exercise technical judgment to keep goals for programs, projects and products attainable within a given timeline']
Industries: Information Technology and Services, Internet, and Computer & Network Security

Formamos uma equipa multidisciplinar, onde a nossa visão passa por Liderar a inovação em TICE e a nossa missão por Transformar o conhecimento em tecnologia com valor na cadeia de inovação, mantendo sempre os nossos valores: confiança, agilidade, excelência e cooperação.Desejamos atualmente um Data Scientist & Tech Leader para integrar e expandir a nossa equipa num projeto tecnologicamente ambicioso.O QUE ESPERAMOS DOS NOSSOS CANDIDATOSA reportar ao Coordenador de Unidade de Inteligência Artificial, terá como principais responsabilidades:»Desenvolvimento de aplicações com elevado nível de qualidade, serviço e disponibilidade;»Pesquisa, desenvolvimento, teste e avaliação de novas ideias e soluções;»Utilização e aplicação de técnicas avançadas de Machine Learning e NLP (processamento de linguagem natural) em projetos;»Participação ativa em todas as fases do ciclo de vida de desenvolvimento de software: análise, planeamento, desenvolvimento, teste, operacionalidade e suporte metas dos projetos e gerir as expectativas dos stakeholders;PERFIL»Formação superior ao nível de Mestrado ou Doutoramento em áreas relacionadas com Inteligência Artificial;»Experiência mínima de 3 anos em função relacionada com Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing ou Data Science, de preferência em funções de liderança;»Proficiência em Python e em plataformas de Machine Learning Our presence in Portugal Since 1985, BNP Paribas was one of the first foreign banks to operate in the country. Today, the Group has around 6.500 employees across several entities operating directly in the territory, offering a wide range of integrated financial solutions to support its clients and their businesses.   International reach Thanks to its international presence and regular and close collaboration among its different entities, BNP Paribas has the resources to support all clients with financing, investment, savings and protection solutions that help make their projects a success. BNP Paribas holds key positions in its three core operating divisions: Domestic Markets and International Financial Services for retail banking and specialised financial services, and Corporate & Institutional Banking for corporate and institutional clients.In its Corporate & Institutional Banking and International Financial Services activities, BNP Paribas also enjoys top positions in Europe, a strong presence in the Americas as well as a solid and fast-growing business in Asia-Pacific. ', 'Ambition & Results ', 'Apoiamos o crescimento pessoal e profissional de nossos colaboradores. ', 'Criámos o conceito de Strategic Gatherings, um momento onde são partilhadas informações sobre a performance da empresa e se abordam perspetivas de futuro a curto prazo. ', 'Caring & Sharing ', 'Criámos os Blue Angels, um programa de responsabilidade social e ambiental que coloca a solidariedade dos nossos colaboradores ao serviço da comunidade. ao aumento da sua competitividade. Formamos uma equipa multidisciplinar, onde a nossa visão passa por Liderar a inovação e a nossa missão por Transformar o conhecimento em tecnologia, mantendo sempre os nossos valores: confiança, Unidade de Inteligência Artificial, terá como principais responsabilidades:»Desenvolvimento de aplicações com elevado nível de qualidade, serviço e disponibilidade;»Pesquisa, desenvolvimento, teste e avaliação de novas ideias e soluções;»Utilização e aplicação de técnicas avançadas de Machine Learning e NLP (processamento de linguagem natural) em projetos;»Participação ativa em todas as fases do ciclo de vida de desenvolvimento de software: análise, planeamento, desenvolvimento, teste, operacionalidade e suporte técnico;»Ser parte essencial do processo de geração de ideias e participar em
